title: EventBridge API Destinations with OAuth credentials using CMK encryption
description: Create an EventBridge rule and API Destination with OAuth credentials using Customer Managed Key (CMK) encryption

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern configures an EventBridge rule that routes to an API Destinations target using Oauth credentials with Customer Managed Key (CMK) encryption. It configures a Connection, which contains the authorization for the API endpoint with CMK encryption, and the API, which contains the URL, http method, and other configuration information.

testing.headline: Testing
text: 1. From a command line in this directory, send a test event to EventBridge simulating a "EventBridge CMK Demo success" event: aws events put-events --entries file://testEvent.json

cleanup.headline: Cleanup
text: 2. Confirm the stack has been deleted: aws cloudformation list-stacks --query "StackSummaries[?contains(StackName,'STACK_NAME')].StackStatus"
